Detailed Description

This class contains information update for the distances and times about the next turn. A UpdateNavigationDistanceInfo is an update to an UpdateNavigationInfo.

Parameters:
distanceToGoal The distance to left to the destination.

distanceToNextTurnInUnit The distance to the next turn formated in the distance unit set in settings.

timeToNextTurn Time left to the next turn.
